refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This manual page will document briefly the &dhpackage; command.
This manual page was written for the Debian distribution because the original program does not have a manual page.
&dhpackage; is a small chemical viewer application, which can show chemical/x-pdb (*.pdb), chemical/x-mdl-molfile (*.mol) ans chemical/x-xyz (*.xyz) file formats.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: This program does not have any command line options.

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: This manual page was written by &dhusername; &dhemail; for the Debian system (but may be used by others).
